00001 
00002 subroutine integrator
00003 
00004   use treevars
00005   use physvars
00006   implicit none
00007 
00008   ! Integrator
00009   if (scheme == 6 ) then
00010      call push_full3v(1,npp,dt)  ! full EM pusher (all E, B components)
00011   else
00012      call velocities(1,npp,dt)  ! pure ES, NVT ensembles
00013   endif
00014 
00015   call push_x(1,npp,dt)  ! update positions
00016 
00017 
00018   boundaries: select case(particle_bcs)
00019 
00020   case(2)
00021      call constrain   ! relective particle bcs for temperature-clamp mode
00022   case(3)
00023      call earth_plate  ! special bcs for grounded target end 
00024   case default
00025      ! do nothing
00026 
00027   end select boundaries
00028 
00029 end subroutine integrator
